Kount_Ris\Request

Class Kount_Ris_Request_Inquiry

public class Kount_Ris_Request_Inquiry

Perform an initial inquiry request (MODE 'Q' or 'P') to RIS.

Basic usage example:
<code> <?php include '/path/to/sdk/autoload.php';
try { $inquiry = new Kount_Ris_Request_Inquiry();
// session id (SESS) is a unique identifier for this customer's // interaction with your server. In php this this often the output of // session_id() $inquiry->setSessionId('fakesessionid');
// provide payment credentials:
// for a credit card payment $inquiry->setCardPayment('4111111111111111'); // for a PayPal payment: $inquiry->setPaypalPayment("testingpaypal111111"); // for a check payment: $inquiry->setCheckPayment("123456789"); // for a Google payment: $inquiry->setGooglePayment("123456789012345"); // for a BillMeLater payment: $inquiry->setBillMeLaterPayment("1234567890123456"); // for no payment (for example, a trial sign up): $inquiry->setNoPayment();
// provide all additional payment information available:
$inquiry->setTotal(500); $inquiry->setEmail('test@kount.com'); $inquiry->setIpAddress('192.168.0.21'); $inquiry->setMack('Y'); $inquiry->setWebsite("SITE-1"); $inquiry->setAuth('A');
$cart = array(); $cart[] = new Kount_Ris_Data_CartItem("TV", "LZG-123", "32-inch LCD", 1, 129999); $inquiry->setCart($cart);
// Setting user defined fields example $inquiry->setUserDefinedField("label", "value");
// additional optional setters...
$inquiry->setDateOfBirth("YYYY-MM-DD");
// setGender value can be either "M" or "F" $inquiry->setGender("M");
$response = $inquiry->getResponse();
// optional getter $warnings = $response->getWarnings(); $score = $response->getScore(); $auto = $response->getAuto();
} catch (Exception $e) { // handle exception } </code>

Field Detail

MODE_Q

const string MODE_Q = 'Q'

Normal inquiry

MODE_P

const string MODE_P = 'P'

Phone order inquiry

MALE

const string MALE = 'M'

Gender male.

See: setGender()

FEMALE

const string FEMALE = 'F'

Gender female.

See: setGender()

SHIP_SAME

const string SHIP_SAME = 'SD'

Same day shipping.

See: setShipType()

SHIP_NEXT

const string SHIP_NEXT = 'ND'

Next day shipping.

See: setShipType()

SHIP_2ND

const string SHIP_2ND = '2D'

Second day shipping.

See: setShipType()

SHIP_STD

const string SHIP_STD = 'ST'

Standard shipping

See: setShipType()
